# Data Type

# Reading in JSON files

Options:
 + rjson
 + jsonlite
 + rjsonio
 
# Dataset

This example will use data from a JSON on Accidental Drug Deaths in CT from 2012-2018. The JSON file is accessible via an API, and `jsonlite` will be used to read in the data. 

```{r}
data <- fromJSON("https://data.ct.gov/resource/deaths.json")
```
